title: Move first star farther from spawn + update Space controls legend

requirements.text: Adjust collectible generation so that the first collectible star the player encounters is placed meaningfully farther from the player spawn position, so it is not reachable immediately after starting the game.

quotes: Move the first star a bit further away from the starting point.

acceptanceCriteria: On a fresh game load, the closest uncollected star is not within immediate reach of the spawn area (i.e., the player must travel noticeably downward before encountering the first star).
The game still generates 7 total collectible stars and they remain inside the corridor and not intersecting obstacles.

requirements.text: Update the gameplay controls legend text under the canvas to change the phrase “Space to act & collect stars” to “Space to act”.

quotes: change "Space to act & collect stars" to "Space to act"

acceptanceCriteria: The controls legend displays: “Arrow keys to move • Space to act • J to tell a joke”.
No other gameplay control text is changed.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/immutablePaths (compose existing components/hooks instead).
Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Do not change star pickup mechanics (it should remain Space-gated with proximity requirement).
Do not change world generation shape/size beyond repositioning the first star.
Do not add new collectibles, HUD elements, or new sound/animation work.
